channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Extended Lifecycle Support
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Extended Lifecycle Support

item.title: CVE-2024-5564|2024-09-16T20:34:19.595Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20enterprise%20linux%207%20extended%20lifecycle%20support
item.description: A vulnerability was found in libndp. This flaw allows a local malicious user to cause a buffer overflow in NetworkManager, triggered by sending a malformed IPv6 router advertisement packet. This issue occurred as libndp was not correctly validating the route length information.
